title: never once dodged, 15 minute penalty, because client keeps freezing....
body:
Seriously i have never dodged or ragequit a match, and my client is freezing so much on champ select that i'm being penalized heavily for something to do with my client.

On a different, higher spec'd computer, i had this issue last season, costing my gold ribbon, and then my re-earned red ribbon.

This is a major problem for me, and i'm wondering if anyone knows of a solution other than just petitioning riot to fix their client with ten paragraphs of ragetext

replies.body:
Freezing in champ select is often a result of the client experiencing small drops from the matchmaking server. If this is happening, it's generally caused by one of two factors: problematic local network configurations or poor ISP routing to the server. A good place to start is by working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as we've consolidated the most common solutions for this issue in it. 

Let me know the results of working through those steps.

yeah it sucks. i've had it happen numerous times. but they are working on the alpha client so kiss some LP goodbye. I play 5 man premades with 8 different people for more than 5 hours a day and we always have an issue like this at least 4 times a day for 1 or more of us. Add in the hextech closing the client and its super fun. Learn to love the bugs brah.
